title: Nanatsu no Taizai: Kamigami no Gekirin
synopsis: After saving the Kingdom of Liones from the 10 Commandments, Meliodas and the Seven Deadly Sins are enjoying their time off. However, things aren't as peaceful as they seem, as the Sins are put through various trials to become strong enough to defeat the 10 Commandments and to overcome their past trauma.
related_anime: ['Nanatsu no Taizai', 'Mameshiba x Nanatsu no Taizai', 'Nanatsu no Taizai: Imashime no Fukkatsu', 'Nanatsu no Taizai: Fundo no Shinpan', 'Hawk no Onayami Soudanshitsu']
